form.name: form1

p.span: To download this letter click on the link below:

, Superintendent of Waverly City Schools was contacted by Arby’s of Waverly. They are offering a free kids meal for school age children from March 16-March 20. I have attached their information. If any other local business is providing a similar service, please contact me, and I will add you to this list.

br.span: I would like to sincerely thank Arby’s of Waverly for helping care for OUR students.

u.font: Message from our school nurse Kelly Williams:

p.span: Here are some helpful CDC tips and resources to help prevent the spread of the flu this season. Please click the link to view...
Please click on the link below to view ...

span.strong: The Safe School Helpline: Help Keep Our Schools Safe

div.span: Let us know anonymously when you know of something that threatens the safety of our school.

div.strong: The Waverly Way Store: Helping our Students

div.span: Waverly parents we need your help! We are beginning a Waverly Way Store to help our students. The Waverly Way Store will provide toiletries, school supplies, and other basic items
to our students in need. The Waverly Way Store will be located at the high school building. Students from the high school and junior high will be able to visit this in a confidential manner.

hr.div: The Waverly Way Store is accepting donations for the following items and asks your help in building the initial inventory available to the students.
Any of the following items would be greatly appreciated!
Donations can be dropped off at all school offices Monday-Friday from 7:30 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. Please continue to donate throughout the year to keep this resource open to our students.
